statements.select: select a.order_detail_sku_id ,a.order_id ,a.sku_id ,a.price ,b.item_name ,b.prop_1_detail_name ,b.prop_2_detail_name ,b.prop_3_detail_name ,b.prop_4_detail_name ,b.prop_5_detail_name From T_Adjustment_Order_Detail_Sku a inner join vw_sku b on(a.sku_id = b.sku_id)

select * From ( select a.order_detail_sku_id ,a.order_id ,a.sku_id ,a.price ,b.item_name ,b.prop_1_detail_name ,b.prop_2_detail_name ,b.prop_3_detail_name ,b.prop_4_detail_name ,b.prop_5_detail_name From T_Adjustment_Order_Detail_Sku a inner join vw_sku b on(a.sku_id = b.sku_id) union all select REPLACE(newid(),'-','') order_detail_sku_id ,a.order_id ,b.sku_id ,a.price ,b.item_name ,b.prop_1_detail_name ,b.prop_2_detail_name ,b.prop_3_detail_name ,b.prop_4_detail_name ,b.prop_5_detail_name From T_Adjustment_Order_Detail_Item a inner join vw_sku b on(a.item_id = b.item_id) ) x where 1=1 and x.order_id=#OrderId#
